item.title: Samsung's Affordable Galaxy A36 and Galaxy A26 Will Get 6 Years of Software Updates
item.description: The company’s latest affordable smartphones are thinner and more durable and have a sprinkling of AI.

item.title: Texas Official Warns Against ‘Measles Parties’ Amid Growing Outbreak
item.description: At least 146 measles cases have been identified in West Texas so far, including 20 hospitalizations and one death.
